titles.title: Alzheimer's Home and Community Care Project Act
A bill to amend the provisions of the Public Health Service Act regarding grants to States for projects relating to Alzheimer's disease, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S12243)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

bill.summary: 9/22/1993--Introduced. Alzheimer's Home and Community Care Project Act - Amends the Public Health Service Act concerning grants for demonstration projects with respect to Alzheimer's Disease to: (1) authorize appropriations through FY 1998; and (2) make other specified changes concerning such projects.
